message: Hi Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to sell it to you for a special price today.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer, but $18000 is beyond my budget. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $10000 is too low for this product. I can lower my price to $16500 if that works better for you.
Thank you for considering my position, Alice. However, my budget is still quite limited. I can offer $11000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
